title: Vesta's longsword

properties.name: description
properties.value: Vesta's longsword is a slash weapon requiring level 78 Attack to wield. It can only be obtained during Deadman Mode.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Vesta's longsword
This article is about the standard variant. For blighted variant, see Vesta's blighted longsword.

Vesta's longsword is a slash weapon requiring level 78 Attack to wield. It can only be obtained during Deadman Mode.

In Deadman seasonals, it is dropped by any monster found in the Wilderness as part of a global loot table, the chance being relative to the combat level of the monster. It is part of Vesta's equipment, a set of Ancient Warriors' equipment.

LungeStabControlledAttack, Strength, Defence, and Hitpoints+1 Attack, Strength, and Defence
BlockSlashDefensiveDefence and Hitpoints+3 Defence

Special attack[edit | edit source]

A player performing Vesta's longsword's special attack.

Vesta's longsword has a special attack, Feint, that consumes 25% of the player's special attack energy and deals between 20% and 120% of the user's max hit, with the accuracy of this attack rolled against 25% of the opponent's defence.

[[File:Vesta's longsword detail.png|150px|left]]
'''Vesta's longsword''' is a slash weapon requiring level 78 [[Attack]] to wield. It can only be obtained during [[Deadman Mode]]. 

In [[Deadman Mode#Seasonals|Deadman seasonals]], it is dropped by any monster found in the [[Wilderness]] as part of a global loot table, the chance being relative to the combat level of the monster. It is part of [[Vesta's equipment]], a set of [[Ancient Warriors' equipment]].

Vesta's longsword has a [[special attack]], ''Feint'', that consumes 25% of the player's [[special attack energy]] and deals between 20% and 120% of the user's max hit, with the accuracy of this attack rolled against 25% of the opponent's [[defence]].
